title: Ilbaay Consulting – Website Development
description: Modern, responsive consulting website featuring clean UI, clear service sections, and a professional brand experience.
longDescription: A complete multi-page website built for Ilbaay Consulting with a clean, modern interface. The site includes Home, About, Services, and Contact pages with a blue-green brand palette, smooth navigation, responsive layouts, and optimized performance.

title: Daljir Consulting – Website Development
description: A clean and responsive consulting firm website showcasing impact, services, and organizational background.
longDescription: Developed a modern website for Daljir Consulting with professional layouts, impact statistics, service sections, partner logos, and clear calls-to-action. The site highlights their mission, consulting programs, and organizational achievements.

title: Barbaar Organization (BYEO) – Website Development
description: Youth organization website showcasing programs, mission, impact, and community initiatives.
longDescription: Created a modern, multi-page website for Barbaar Organization (BYEO), featuring sections for programs, youth empowerment, child protection, organizational mission, milestones, and donation engagement. Designed with clean UI, soft gradients, and smooth navigation.

title: RADI – Research Institute Website
description: Multi-page research institute website highlighting mission, expertise, publications, and impact.
longDescription: Designed a professional website for RADI, featuring research-focused layouts, impact statistics, organizational values, expertise categories, calls-to-action, and optimized navigation. Built for credibility, clarity, and institutional presentation.

title: HOAIPS – Website Redesign
description: Complete redesign of HOAIPS institutional website with modern UI, responsive pages, and improved usability.
longDescription: Redesigned the entire HOAIPS website into a clean, multi-page platform with improved visuals, faster performance, better navigation, and modern information structure. The new design highlights programs, mission, partnerships, and organizational impact.
